messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey, awards are available, can all department heads come to the bridge?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Medal of valour available for whoever cathces the mime and clown, they are now kos as htey have emagged their way into the armory

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm upping the rewards, my hat and a medal of valour for whoever kills the clown and mime

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The mime is still KoS, eth clown has confirmed he broke intyo the armory and the emag foudn in space confirms my suspicions, awards will be handed out for hte mimes head

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alex dowdall an escaped convict and the mime are still at large to my knowledge, medal of valour still up for grabs and my hat will go to whoever assists the arrests

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: #4nd%;f4y6,>ï¿½%-BZZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey, the station kind of needs a janitor, if somebody wanna take it up part time it would be a big help

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The mime was foudn dead in space with alex dowdall, teh station should now be completely safe, have an enjoyable shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Since all threats have been dealt wiht, shuttle Y/N?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HoS to bridge

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I gotta SSD dudes, good shift though, see yall later

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: A captain goes down with his ship, i'm staying in my quarters

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Test Area.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Jacob Sawyer (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Earlier today I was pied by a clown or something. I hate clowns.</font>

messages.author: Jacob Sawyer (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">When I walk into my office, I find it vandalized. An officer tases one of my machines. Why?</font>

comments.author: Taya Velvet (Cook)
comments.body: Because the security force on this station just isn't robust.
